thread.title: Alia's heartfelt message for her grandmother
thread.title_full: Alia's heartfelt message for her grandmother

title: Alia's heartfelt message for her grandmother
text: Be the first one to review. We have sent you a verification email. To verify, just follow the link in the message 4 /17 PIC: Alia Bhatt received a b’day wish from her ‘husband’ Alia Bhatt celebrated her 23rd birthday yesterday on 15 March, 2016, and had wishes pouring in all day from friends, family, fans and her husband. Yes, her husband! No guys it’s not a new man in her life, it’s just her BFF, Anushka Rajan who took to Instagram to share the above picture of them playing fugdi. While the picture is too darn cute to be missed, Anushka’s post alongside is even cuter. The ‘Wedding Pullav’ actress wrote, “It's safe to say i wouldn't hop onto a plane to be with anybody else for just 4 hours, but I'd walk to you if i had no other way. Happy birthday to my better half, my sister, my soul mate, alter ego, husband, boyfriend, bestfriend and everything in between and above! To a thousand more years of fudgi and all the weird stuff we loved doing as children. Love you long time." Awww! Move on to check out more Insta pictures of Alia that are definitely not to be missed… by Kiran Kaur All Comments ()
